title: Supabase Auth Verification

type_check.notes: Uses existing @supabase/supabase-js v2.89.0, TypeScript native, no type conflicts

constraint_check.notes: Zero new dependencies. Respects all invariants: Supabase PostgreSQL, TypeScript, vl_ prefix

logic_check.notes: Method steps logically lead to outcome. auth.uid() in RLS policies directly enforces broker isolation. Email domain trigger prevents unauthorized signups.

fv_rationale: Native integration with existing stack. Well-documented APIs. Production-proven at scale. auth.uid() available in all RLS policies without custom work.
